title: Glowing Chasm
text:
Cold violet light illuminates the air and sky for miles around this gash in the northern [[Mournland]]. The glow emanates from deep within the chasm, its source indiscernible from the canyonâ€™s rim. Horrid monsters, some mutated beyond recognition, congregate about the supernatural rift. The bruised luminance continues to warp them if they stay for long.

The [[warforged colossus]] WX-11, "Arkus", lies prone at the bottom of the Glowing Chasm, with one of its arms torn off.
